Packham said: ‚Äú.... in the first few days of January, we have seen our government ship our problematic unsorted plastic waste around the world to countries who don‚Äôt have the capacity to deal with it.‚Äù @EnvAgency @ChrisGPackham Try solving the problem with HydroBlox! @HydroBlox

@EnvAgency Thank you for supporting residents and communities during and after the event (much appreciated)... how about spending some money, implementing policy and RMAs work together BEFORE the next event?
Communities are suffering repeatedly and the Gov seems to have abandoned us üò°

I worked with the @envagency over 20 years ago. We had the same handwringing over flood funding. Great promises, superb paper presentations, new high viz jackets for visiting politicians to view makeshift flood defence fencework but year on year #flood funding cut, cut, cut.
